title: Aatrox ult music
body: so its been a long time since its been removed, and still no explanation. so rito, can we get aatrox login page music back during his ult? or at least an explanation of why it was removed.{{champion:266}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}}

replies.body: I literally worked on him, and I don't know.  If you get answer let me know.   {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
A different question, can you share what Aatrox was doing in the Freljord to fuck up Trynd's tribe

I will say that he’s been traveling around the world for looong time.   Looking for a better host(s)—and indirectly, perhaps only subconciously, he wanted  to get away from his homeland and headed towards the location of the only other major void incursion.

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jFb3VXOW,comment-id=000000020001,timestamp=2019-01-09T16:57:24.728+0000)
>
> I will say that he’s been traveling around the world for looong time.   Looking for a better host(s)—and indirectly, perhaps only subconciously, he wanted  to get away from his homeland and headed towards the location of the only other major void incursion.

Can I ask you if Aatrox presence is generally noticed? Because he doesnt seem to be on the down low so Im just wondering if some people notice his travelling and disturbance in runeterra..
Id be  very incognito if I was him (given his strength atm) but i didnt get that feeling in Tryndameres story
Wait so it was intentional and some other team removed it because they thought it was a bug? LOL

Is it unclear?

"Ignoring this, Ashe offered to adopt his people as her own, if he became her first and only bloodsworn.

Tryndamere accepted reluctantly."
Oh oops missed that part since I spent more time reading Sylas’ stuff and breezed through the others
